name: Forest of Dogs
description:
Description  

You play as a newly adopted Shiba Inu in the middle of a forest. Your goal is to find your way back home to your family and bring the other lost dogs with you on your way. 

Lurking on the path home are all your biggest enemies - balloons that could pop at any second, horrible and loud vacuum cleaners and squeaky rubber duckies! You have to defeat them in combat alongside your new friends. 

No matter your age, Forest of Dogs is a welcoming adventure RPG from a dogs’ perspective with cute visuals, exciting soundtrack and captivating combat. Reveal a heartwarming story about family and finding your way home. 

Features

Recruit charming and lovable dogs 
Complete quests for the lost dogs of the forest and they will join your party! 

Fight against the dogs biggest enemies 
Construct your strategy to defeat the scary opponents in combat! 

Explore the Forest of Dogs™ 
What will you find in the beautiful and vast autumn forest? Unfold a wonderful story about finding your family and your way home. 

Bark
Guess the button.

Install Instructions

Download, unzip and play. Go fetch!
